alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Lipscomb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 18 at 5:38PM CDT until September 18 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Lipscomb County in the Panhandle of Texas... Central Hemphill County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 538 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Canadian, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Canadian, Glazier, and Lake Marvin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
